channel.title: Cumulus Linux User Guide on Cumulus Networks Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Cumulus Linux User Guide on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: What's New in Cumulus Linux 3.1
item.description: What’s New in Cumulus Linux 3.1.2 Cumulus Linux 3.1.2 includes bug fixes as well as the following early access feature. Edge-Core 5812-54X What’s New in Cumulus Linux 3.1.1 Cumulus Linux 3.1.1 contains bug fixes and the following early access features. Priority flow control (PFC) — Mellanox switches only Explicit congestion notification (ECN) — Mellanox switches only Ethernet virtual private networks (EVPN) — Broadcom switches only

item.title: Quick Start Guide
item.description: This chapter helps you get up and running with Cumulus Linux quickly and easily. What’s New in Cumulus Linux 3.1.2 Cumulus Linux 3.1.2 contains bugs fixes and an early access platform. The release notes contain information about the release as well as the fixed and known issues. Open Source Contributions Cumulus Networks has forked various software projects, like CFEngine, Netdev and some Puppet Labs packages in order to implement various Cumulus Linux features.
